summary: Tested Reports module for Contacts area. All 13 features tested and working correctly. The Reports dashboard includes 4 charts (AreaChart, Donut/PieChart, horizontal BarChart, Top 5 labels), Quick Stats, and real-time updates when filters change.
critical_code_review_comments: VERIFIED: 'Reportes' button appears in action bar with BarChart3 icon
VERIFIED: Reports dashboard opens with dark elegant background (slate-900 gradient)
VERIFIED: Chart 1 - 'Contactos creados en el tiempo' shows AreaChart with correct data
VERIFIED: Chart 2 - 'Distribución por etiquetas' shows Donut chart with percentages
VERIFIED: Chart 3 - 'Contactos por tipo' shows horizontal BarChart with Clientes/Prospectos/Proveedores
VERIFIED: Chart 4 - 'Top 5 etiquetas más usadas' shows horizontal bars with ranking
VERIFIED: Quick Stats shows 4 cards: Contactos mostrados, Total tipo, Etiquetas creadas, Total general
VERIFIED: Charts use useMemo based on filteredContacts for real-time updates
VERIFIED: Header shows filtered contacts count (e.g., '2 contactos • Prospectos')
VERIFIED: X button closes the Reports panel
VERIFIED: Empty state messages shown when no data (Proveedores tab)
VERIFIED: Tooltips configured in all charts with dark theme styling
VERIFIED: Date filter dropdown available with 4 modes (Día, Semana, Mes, Año)
seed_data_creation: Used existing test data - 2 clients (Carlos Rodríguez, Juano Pérez Test), 2 prospects (spencer zapata salinas with MATRICULADO and NO QUIERE labels)
context_for_next_testing_agent: Reports module is fully functional. The 'Reportes' button opens a dashboard with 4 charts using recharts library. Charts 1, 2, 4 use filteredContacts data (real-time updates). Chart 3 uses allContactsCounts (total counts per type). Quick Stats show 4 metrics. Empty state messages appear when no data available.

reportes_button_visible.description: Botón 'Reportes' aparece en la barra de acciones

dashboard_opens_with_dark_background.description: Click en 'Reportes' abre el dashboard con fondo oscuro elegante (slate-900 gradient)

chart_1_area_chart.description: Gráfico 1: Contactos creados en el tiempo muestra AreaChart con datos correctos

chart_2_donut_chart.description: Gráfico 2: Distribución por etiquetas muestra Donut chart con porcentajes

chart_3_bar_chart_horizontal.description: Gráfico 3: Contactos por tipo muestra BarChart horizontal con Clientes/Prospectos/Proveedores

chart_4_top_5_labels.description: Gráfico 4: Top 5 etiquetas más usadas muestra barras horizontales con ranking

quick_stats_4_cards.description: Quick Stats: 4 tarjetas con métricas (Contactos mostrados, Total tipo, Etiquetas creadas, Total general)

charts_update_on_label_filter.description: Los gráficos se actualizan en tiempo real al aplicar filtro de etiqueta (useMemo based on filteredContacts)

charts_update_on_date_filter.description: Los gráficos se actualizan en tiempo real al aplicar filtro de fecha

header_shows_filtered_count.description: Header del dashboard muestra conteo de contactos filtrados (e.g., '2 contactos • Prospectos')

x_button_closes_panel.description: Botón X cierra el panel de reportes

empty_state_messages.description: Mensaje 'No hay etiquetas suficientes' cuando no hay etiquetas asignadas (verified on Proveedores tab)

tooltips_on_charts.description: Tooltips funcionan al pasar mouse sobre los gráficos (configured with dark theme styling)

ui_components_verified: 'Reportes' button with BarChart3 icon in action bar
Dashboard header with icon, title 'Dashboard de Reportes', and contact count
X button to close the panel
Chart 1: 'Contactos creados en el tiempo' with TrendingUp icon and AreaChart
Chart 2: 'Distribución por etiquetas' with PieChart icon and Donut chart with legend
Chart 3: 'Contactos por tipo' with Users icon and horizontal BarChart
Chart 4: 'Top 5 etiquetas más usadas' with Award icon and progress bars
Quick Stats: 4 cards with metrics in slate-800/30 background
Empty state messages for charts when no data available
Dark theme styling with slate-900 gradient background

chart_data_sources.contactsOverTimeData: useMemo based on filteredContacts, grouped by date (day/week/month/year)
chart_data_sources.labelDistributionData: useMemo based on filteredContacts and contactLabels
chart_data_sources.contactsByTypeData: useMemo based on allContactsCounts (client, prospect, supplier)
